Comment: > Side conversation — what is your view on our current political climate as a Canadian? Views considering Trump’s stance on Canada becoming 51st?  Covered in a comment from a few days ago (go to my profile and search "blame Trump"). But the "51st state" comment never meant much to me personally, and initially I viewed it as a playful jab to start getting Canadians to think about the beaurocratic/globalist stranglehold going on in our own country. Shame that a sizable chunk of people (mostly dumb and selfish Boomers) fell for Mark Carney saying "I will protect you from the big bad America trying to get you!" in response to Trump's comments -- I pray most Canadians aren't dumb enough for them to use that as a smokescreen to implement Globalist policies.  >Maybe I am misunderstanding your sentiment, but I see this rhetoric as having conviction.   I'm not saying the Epstein files aren't important, but at this point everyone already knows we all want the files, and that we all are craving some convictions. But it's done so incessantly that it just feels like noise at this point, and it distracts/trains us to think that saying "Where Epstein?!?!" will make any real difference. It's no different from a Lefty putting a Ukrainian flag in their bio, and saying "it's important because it shows our conviction towards a righteous cause".  ___  Anyway, if it helps, Jones had some people on talking about the Epstein files a while ago. Apparently after the FBI raided, well, the FBI in Southern New York, a whole bunch of floodgates got opened up, and many terabytes of files and other material had become available for FBI field offices around the country to volunteer to comb through it all (one FBI dude that was interviewed also said he was Epstein material accidentally shared via a Shared Drive folder, which goes to show how widely circulating it is internally).  That's pretty much Order 66 if you ask me, because historically Epstein matters would 100% of the time CONVENIENTLY go to Jamies Comie or his daughter Morine Comey, and it'd just get silently punted without anyone knowing about. James "Dig In And Resist" Comie's since been given the boot, and there's been lots of pressure on Morine Comie punting Epstein shit, so it leans towards something been done this time, instead of just being silo'd at a high level and then forgotten.  So there's that, at least. I hope the gubmint ain't yanking our chains again, but I'd like to believe that it will at least take a while to go through, because there's many terabytes of utterly horrifying and physchologically-scarring shit in there, and it's being worked on in a volunteer-only basis due to its terrible nature.
